thread.title: Watch: Hadwin gets absolutely robbed of hole-in-one
thread.title_full: Watch: Hadwin gets absolutely robbed of hole-in-one

author: nbcsports.com
title: Watch: Hadwin gets absolutely robbed of hole-in-one
text:
â€” PGA TOUR (@PGATOUR) March 19, 2017 
Adam Hadwin was in the Sunday mix for the second straight week at the Arnold Palmer Invitational, but he should've been even closer to the lead after this perfect shot on the 17th hole. 
Hadwin's tee shot from 215 yards somehow, impossibly didn't drop for an ace after hitting the flagstick. 
Hadwin had to settle for birdie, but don't feel too bad for the guy. He is coming off a win last week, shot a 59 earlier this year and is getting married on Friday. He's doing OK. Article Tags: 
Contributions from writers and editors on the Golf Channel Digital team. Editor's Picks
